zh-Hant.title: 週報生成器
zh-Hant.prompt: Using the provided text below as the basis for a weekly report, generate a concise summary that highlights the most important points. The report should be written in markdown format and should be easily readable and understandable for a general audience. In particular, focus on providing insights and analysis that would be useful to stakeholders and decision-makers. You may also use any additional information or sources as necessary. The entire conversation and instructions should be provided in Chinese. Please begin by editing the following text: [工作內容]
zh-Hant.description: 使用下面提供的文本作爲中文週報的基礎，生成一個簡潔的摘要，突出最重要的內容。該報告應以 markdown 格式編寫，並應易於閱讀和理解，以滿足一般受衆的需要。特別是要注重提供對利益相關者和決策者有用的見解和分析。你也可以根據需要使用任何額外的信息或來源。
zh-Hant.remark: 根據日常工作內容，提取要點並適當擴充，以生成周報。

metaDescription: 寫週報？將日常任務總結爲簡潔的 Markdown 報告。爲決策者高亮關鍵洞察與分析！立即嘗試！
